trigger: Genomic DNA from leukemic cells Jurkat , CML-T1 , U-937 , K-562 , EM-2 and BV-173 was digested with the methylation - sensitive enzymes HpaII , Bsh1236I and HaeII-isochizomer Bsp143II .
